results.definition: the act of participating in an athletic competition involving running on a track
the act of running; traveling on foot at a fast pace
(American football) a play in which a player attempts to carry the ball through or past the opposing team
examples: the coach put great emphasis on running

results.definition: (of e.g. a machine) performing or capable of performing

examples: cost of lumber per running foot

results.definition: continually repeated over a period of time
of advancing the ball by running
examples: the team's running plays worked better than its pass plays

results.definition: (of fluids) moving or issuing in a stream
examples: as mountain stream with freely running water

results.definition: the act of administering or being in charge of something
examples: he has responsibility for the running of two companies at the same time

results.definition: the state of being in operation

examples: running plays worked better than pass plays
